tool.name: mtbls520_18_phylogeny
tool.description: Perform phylogeny comparison analysis from the MTBLS520 study.
tool.help: This is the computational workflow to study the seasonal variation of secondary metabolites in nine different bryophytes. ---- Module: Phylogeny and chemotaxonomy comparison analysis Description: Perform phylogeny and chemotaxonomy comparison analysis. Input parameters: - Input Rdata file - Input phylogeny file Output parameters: - Phylogeny Procrustes analysis plot - Phylogeny and chemotaxonomy comparison plot ---- For updates and documentation, please visit: https://github.com/korseby/container-mtbls520
